item.title: Untitled
item.description: Assignment#2 Q2: Dependency Parsing This is a detailed notes on the python code for assignment Q2 Setting up configuration import time import os import logging from collections import Counter import numpy as np # setting up configurations P_PREFIX = '<p>:' L_PREFIX = '<l>:' UNK = '<UNK>' NULL = '<NULL>' ROOT = '<ROOT>' class Config(object): language = 'english' with_punct = True unlabeled = True lowercase = True use_pos = True #use position of s as features use_dep = True # use_dep = use_dep and (not unlabeled) data_path = '.
